timeline.message: Merge branch 'jira/NMS-12886' of github.com:OpenNMS/opennms into jira/NMS-12886

timeline.bodyText: I am wondering if we can't replace this inner class with java.time.Duration? I believe it represents the same.
timeline.author: patrick-schweizer

replies.bodyText: The Java Duration class models an amount of time. This does not include a start or end timestamp of the duration, just the duration itself. I query the start and end timestamps of the associated outages and have to merge them together. So, I need the start and end timestamps for this, because the outages of different services may overlap.
replies.author: christianpape

timeline.bodyText: Maybe replace with a static method that creates a java.time.Duration?
timeline.author: patrick-schweizer

timeline.bodyText: The key of the map is never used. Can onmsApplication.getMonitoredServices() be used directly in the loop below?
timeline.author: fooker

timeline.bodyText: This call can be moved out of the loop.
timeline.author: fooker
